alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hancock; Interior Hancock (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 9:19PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of west central Hancock County through 945 PM EDT... At 918 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower near Verona Island, or near Bucksport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Bucksport, Dedham, Verona Island, Penobscot Township, Orland, Surry, Otis and Verona. This includes US Highway 1 between Orland and Ellsworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
